title: Reclaim
description: Evil reigns when good men do nothing, and Nick Finnister’s thugs have taken over the city.Millionaire Sean Carpenter, mistaken for social worker Tod Fontwell, is beaten and stripped. When Tod is murdered and Sean discovers Finnister’s evil trade in young bodies, he decides to dedicate his time and money in a campaign to reclaim the city for its residents.He needs a man who can focus his moral crusade.Charismatic singer Joshua Cross seems to fit the bill.
author: Mike  O'Donnell
